title: project lucian lack of rp feelsbadman
body: so i have had 1300 rp for like 2 months waiting for project {{champion:236}}  to go on sale but it didnt and it wont be on sale for the next month 2 so that makes it 3 month ....anyways is there is a way to ask riot for those 50 rp or can some friend of mine like transfer them to me ??? {{champion:32}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: We don't have details on upcoming sales unless it's been announced on the [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page, so you'll want to bookmark that.  We might be able to work something out with you, though!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with your request, and we'll see what we can do.  :D
I did send a ticket they said 50 rp are too much to ask for something like that ...so anywways I got project Lucian on a 40% on my shop and also got bloodmoon thresh from the sale on shop
